sections.heading: Banks; special reports to director
sections.text: A bank shall furnish special reports as may be required by the director to enable the department to obtain full and complete knowledge of the condition of the bank.SourceLaws 1909, c. 10, ยง 19, p. 76;R.S.1913, ยง 298;Laws 1919, c. 190, tit. V, art. XVI, ยง 19, p. 693
